name: Force To Terms & Conditions
author: Anas

sections.description: Force To Updated Terms & Conditions plugin work for logged in user. So user will redirect to terms and conditions page automatically or display updated term notice at top/bottom if current user have new/updated terms and conditions content. When user accept terms then will not see the notice until another update in the terms and condition pages. In backend, you can see who accept latest terms and also can allow your site browse all time without further terms accepts.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/force-to-terms-conditions directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Force Terms screen to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin work for non logged user or visitor?

No, Current version doesn’t working for non logged user or visitor. This only works for logged user.
